pkgmetadata.longdescription: Factor Importance Ranking and Selection using Total Indices // A model-independent factor importance ranking and selection procedure based on total Sobol' indices. Please see Huang and Joseph (2025) doi:10.1080/00401706.2025.2483531. This research is supported by U.S. National Science Foundation grants DMS-2310637 and DMREF-1921873.
